code: import{SET_IS_VALID_TIMETABLE}from"../actions/action-type";export function setIsValidTimetable(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:true;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case SET_IS_VALID_TIMETABLE:{return state=action.payLoad;}default:return state;}}export default setIsValidTimetable;
